text: 1. Modified the IP Spam checker program import java.net.*; public class SpamCheck { public static void main(String[] args) { String IP = args[0];// User Input IP, we will Reverse it String website = "sbl.spamhaus.org"; //www.spamhaus.org/sbl/ try { InetAddress address = InetAddress.getByName (IP) ; byte[] quad = address.getAddress(); String query = website; for (byte octet : quad) { int unsignedByte = octet < 0 ? octet + 256 : octet; query = unsignedByte + "." + query; System.out.println( query) ;} InetAddress.getByName (query) ; System.out.println( IP + " is a known spammer.");} catch (Exception e) { System.out.println(IP + " appears legitimate"); } } } CMPU 3027 Network Programming
